title: Jamil Jan Kochai Reads “Playing Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain”
description: Jamil Jan Kochai reads his story from the January 6, 2020, issue of the magazine. He was a Truman Capote Fellow at the Iowa Writers’ Workshop. His first novel, “99 Nights in Logar,” was published in 2019.
